General.Name: Coast Copper Corp
General.Description: Coast Copper Corp. explores for and evaluates mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for iron, magnetite, copper, gold, molybdenum, and silver deposits. It primarily has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Empire Mine property located in the Rupert District on northern Vancouver Island, British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Roughrider Exploration Limited and changed its name to Coast Copper Corp. in September 2021. Coast Copper Corp. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2

1.Name: Mr. Tim C. Thiessen (Hons), BA, BComm, C.P.A., CA
